content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"French version is available here:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"attachment\",\"data\":{\"size\":34186,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/694ac512-83b1-4da5-be70-a154889db841/France - French - Emakina.FR SA Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/694ac512-83b1-4da5-be70-a154889db841/France - French - Emakina.FR SA Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"fileName\":\"France - French - Emakina.FR SA Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"name\":\"France - French - Emakina.FR SA Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"attachment\",\"id\":\"694ac512-83b1-4da5-be70-a154889db841\",\"extension\":\"docx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Emakina.FR SA, Rue Atlantis 4, Parc dâ€™Ester BP 26840, 87280 Limoges, France (the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"Company\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"), now part of EPAM Systems, Inc. and the EPAM Group of Companies (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"EPAM\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"), is committed to protecting the privacy and security of your personal data. We are providing you with this Privacy Notice to explain our practices regarding the collection, use, and other processing of certain information about you (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"personal data\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\").\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The purpose of this document is to present to you, in a clear and transparent manner, the policy of the Company concerning the protection of your personal data as a member of the company's staff: what data is collected, why is it processed, by whom, with whom is it shared, what are your rights. The implementation of this notice is part of the new legislation on the protection of personal data and, in particular, Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of April 27, 2016 (known as \\\"GDPR\\\") and Law No. 78-17 revised of January 6, 1978, relating to computers, files and freedoms and its implementing decree. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This notice complements the provisions of your employment contract on this subject.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
